website_summaries.verdict: This top ear thermometer from a trusted brand is both accurate and quick.
pros: Large, easy to read digital display
Pre-warmed tip for accuracy and comfort
Positioning system confirms good thermometer position with a light and a beep
Memory function recalls the last temperature reading on the thermometer
cons: Screen is not backlit, so you can't read it in a dark room

customer_reviews.title: Completely inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think my son had a 104 fever so I tried the thermometer on me and it read 107.8. Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: ADHD

customer_reviews.title: Go to thermometer as a Pediatric Nurse
customer_reviews.text: As a pediatric nurse these are my go to thermometer for baby shower gifts. Work so much nicer and faster than any oral or axillary thermometer. I don't like temperal scans, don't trust them. Now with this one you do have to be sure you have it in correctly to get a proper reading. If you are in doubt do it two or three times and take the highest number! It's super quick so the kids can sleep through it too. I did only four stars because I feel like the instructions on use could have pictures or quick steps for new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS - Doesn't tell the correct temps and NOT Returnable - even after only two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Beware - You can't return this!! I had my last one for only a short time (maybe two years?) and it stopped working abruptly. Bought another one and it didn't work from the get go. Tried to return it 15 days after buying and it is "not returnable"... What? Why?? DO not buy!! So temperamental. When you need an accurate temp for a little one you need something you can trust!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was amazing for the first few months I owned it. It's far and away better and more accurate than a forehead thermometer. It's the easiest type to use on a baby or toddler. However, I've found it increasingly inaccurate. I can get a 2 degree difference between ears, and often take the average of 5 tries, rather than trusting one. It doesn't sound like a big deal but when your son has a fever of 104, you need to know every point is accurate. I'd be curious to know if anyone found an ear thermometer that was more accurate than this one.
customer_reviews.author: RMc

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Always good to have a thermometer on hand. Two years after buying this one, I needed it. Consistent readings every time: POS, POS, POS...I changed the batteries -- POS, POS. I took the batteries out and pushed all the butttons to discharge any capacitance--POS, POS. I left the batteries out over night -- POS, POS. I tried new lens caps, guess what? -- POS, POS. You are throwing your money away on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HollisterBulldawg

customer_reviews.title: .poor product
customer_reviews.text: We had to change battery immediately. I nedded a good thermometer after surgery. We got the lemon The worst device I’ve ever purchased I was unable to get accurate track of my fever Look for a different product if it’s for real health care Waist of $40 something dollars Had husband go to dollar store and that one indicated that my fever was spiking and trip back to hospital
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra cost, as I cheaped out first, and still came back to this
customer_reviews.text: We love this, and find it very accurate. I should have bought this first thing. I opted to cheap out and buy a "no name" version of this when our first child was born. It worked for both ear and head. It worked well, up until she was about 2 years old. At which point, we discovered it was not detecting fevers anymore. I guess it was running off a few degrees. This is the same as our pediatricians office uses. We have been very happy with it over the short time we have used it. Fast to detect and seems very accurate. Don't cheap out and buy a no name china brand. This is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Auburngrad

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent temperature readings
customer_reviews.text: The readings for this are constantly all over the place. I use another thermometer to compare with. I always insert at the same angle and depth and I can get a 2+ degree difference from one ear to the next!! I wish I would have realized this before the return policy ended. I think it's junk.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonflydream

customer_reviews.title: 1 to 2 degrees off every time
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this with my infant who had a delayed immune system so keeping track of accurate temperatures is important. This gave me a reading that was 1-2 degrees lower than his rectal temp which is the most accurate. Most recently it registered a 103 fever as 100.3. I would not recommend this thermometer to anyone especially those with compromised immune systems.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella

customer_reviews.title: wish it had a light built in.
customer_reviews.text: it works for the most part, there is a difference in temperature each time you do it. each ear differs as well. it takes about 20 seconds for it to be ready, shove it into your head, click the button, beep its done. but... you can't use it in a dark room, it has no light. you would think in this day and age, everything would be indiglo, but its not, its hard to see the number when its dark. but its nice to have, a lot faster than other methods.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoKing

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: I originally was suckered into buying an Innovo thermometer based on what I now know is Paid Reviews. After trashing the Innovo I picked up the Braun and its far more accurate. Reads same temperature every time and seems very accurate (I always read around 98.4)
customer_reviews.author: dranobob

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable readings and cannot return!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an existing Braun thermometer we had that our toddler sent for a swim in the dogs water bowl. The old one was fantastic, this new one is awful! The readings are not close to accurate and range all over the place. I can check one ear and it says 102.7 and the other ear says 98. And when I try to check my children’s ears it sometimes reads as low as 94! Makes no sense, Braun messed up the design with this new version of their digital ear thermometer. And you cannot return it! What a giant waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what temperature my daughter has. Is it 100.3, 101.8, 102.2, 102.7, or 103.1? My hand on her forehead can give me a better indication of her temperature than this terrible thermometer. I can take her temperature 2 times or 10 times. It doesn't matter which ear, what angle, if she takes her temperature or I do. Of course I bought the thermometer before I actually needed to use it, and now it is outside of the return date. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: nomad

customer_reviews.title: Not loving it
customer_reviews.text: I had very high expectations with this thermometer, because when I asked for recommendations, this is what everyone told me to get. I can typically trust that if my children are running a fever, it will show a higher reading, but it does not seem accurate at all. I have very rarely used this since buying it, which sucks, because this was not cheap. You can take one reading, wait a minute, take it again, and they will be nowhere near the same. I am changing the cover like I am supposed to and everything. I will likely stick to less expensive oral thermometers. I wouldn't recommend this thermometer due to inaccurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: We love this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: We've used a few other different brands of thermometers over the years. All would give us a different reading every time. We love this thermometer. We also like that it came with a pack of filters. It's very easy to turn on and easy to find out your temperature.
customer_reviews.author: jsssooonnn

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer in the past,  new a dud out of the box
customer_reviews.text: We have previously had this thermometer for more than 11 years, and while we took multiple readings to ensure accuracy, had no issues. We bought a new one recently when it became obvious that the readings were no longer accurate. Received promptly from Amazon but within four days the system error was flashing and product customer service verified the unit defective and offered to replace or let me return to Amazon, still obviously under 3 year warranty. The problem is, Amazon will not accept returns on this item, and product customer service takes 2-4 weeks to replace the item. In the meantime I have sick kids and no thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: After a bad experience with the flu and going to work when ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy this thermometer. Just do it. I'm an adult, with no kids. For some reason oral thermometers don't work properly for me and always give an absurdly low reading. After a bad experience with the flu and going to work when I was extremely feverish (but didn't realize it) and nearly hallucinating, I admitted defeat and spent $40 on this thermometer. Now if I'm sick, I can gulp down all the ginger ale and popsicles I want, and still get an accurate reading of my temperature. It's awesome. Side note: if you angle it right, you can launch the lens covers a couple of feet. Pretty entertaining if you're stuck inside sick.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend so much on a thermometer, but we were using a mouth one when my daughter was sick. Told me her temp was 98, but she kept throwing up so I took her to the ER, her real temp was 102.5. I immediately went on here to find a more accurate thermometer. I went off reviews, there were cheaper ones but most had bad reviews. It's been working great! I got what she had and it's helping me keep track of my temp.. I don't know why I waited so long, plus it's quick and painless!
customer_reviews.author: Ally Capriotti

customer_reviews.title: Cost us a ton of $$$
customer_reviews.text: This is not accurate. Only gives you a general idea. We got a super low reading when checking the baby. Of course doctor google said this could be sepsis. So we rushed her to emergency room. All the doctors and nurses there said ear thermometers are NOT accurate and not to trust them. Save yourself the headache and just use an Armpit/ rectal thermometer. This was a very expensive lesson for us to learn :( and we almost had a heart attack from worrying
customer_reviews.author: Connor McKay

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us...
customer_reviews.text: We were really hoping to like this, especially since the brand typically has very good products, but it was so inconsistent (within seconds of a previous reading), so we ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. Used it about a handful of times. A blinking message appears - seeming to hint at a need to replace the lens filter - it won't go away, even after changing the batteries, replacing the lens filters and trying to reset it. No wonder why they are selling a warranty...
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Completely inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this thermometer. But it is super inconsistent. I understand that it wouldn't give the exact same temperature from one sear to the other...but it can be up to two degrees off, more than once! It works sometimes (as in, it is within range of a themometer I trust) and then the next, it will be full degrees off. Totally inconsistent. I love how fast it is, I just wish it was actually accurate. I fear that someone with children or babies (like me) or medical conditions (also me) will make inaccurate medical decisions based on this themometer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Gives accurate reading in seconds
customer_reviews.text: I have the original style for 12 yrs. (long time) and it's starting to be faulty. This looks very similar to the old version and can be used from infant to adult. This comes with a cradle to store it in. My son has the flu and this has been very accurate compared to the Pediatricians. It does come with 20 lens covers. (you need these for it to work) I do use the same one on my son more than once and just alcohol it. Couldn't be without this and it is much more accurate than the forehead scan.
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: If I could give zero starts I would do that ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero starts I would do that. Absolutely unreliable, inconsistent thermometer that reads all over. Overpriced, yes, but I was willing to pay $30+ knowing that the readings would be accurate and consistent (When I say consistent I mean you measure temperature from the same person within 1 minute of each readings and this thermometer gives you different reading every single time..) very frustrating when you have sick children! Have I mentioned that there's no replace/return/refund option on this ?! Shoppers spare your money and Just go to the regular store to get a working, realizable and consistent thermometer because this one is a junk.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Extremely inaccurate and you CAN'T return it!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer said my daughter's temperature was 103.8, three other thermometers said it was 102.1. This is a huge difference, we were about to take her to the hospital. When we discovered this we attempted to return it and you cannot return this item! I am so disappointed, I have a house full of 5 people with influenza and this is not what I need to deal with right now! I just wasted $40 on garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Moms, I write this for you as I feel your pain. I have bought so many thermometers including fancier Brauns that I could never position correctly in my kids‘ ear. This was the easiest to position and use and gave me the most consistent results. This is the very first amazon review I am submitting because i feel it’s important for moms who also struggle to get accurate temps on their kids.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in just less than 10 Minutes after I unpackage this piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: So basically, this plastic disposable (don't know if it's even BPA free, ehh), started flashing and beeping (like a whining baby who doesn't know how to speak), which, according to the trouble shooting page on the user manual, indicates system errors. So I try to feed the baby with some fresh food (I replaced 2 new lens filters). But it's still whining. Then I followed the user manual, did pretty much to what AED does to a live person (so I reset the thing; it's dead for a few seconds but came alive again), but it's still whining. I just got the product and haven't even used it more than 10 minutes. 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: 26zan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and can't return.
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible inaccurate. I measured four people's temperature, three of whom were perfectly healthy. The three healthy people had "fevers" and the one sick person didn't have a fever according to this thermometer. I tried to change the ear plastic thing each time thinking that is what was wrong, but it still didn't work. Now I'm trying to return it, but apparently it isn't eligible for return, however it didn't say that before I bought it. I never would have purchased it if it wasn't eligible for return. Don't buy this, it's a waste of money and dangerous since you can't actually tell someone's temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate or reliable.
customer_reviews.text: NOT RETURNABLE even at day one. This BRAUN thermometer is not trustworthy. If you take your temp and get five different readings ( from 35 to 104 ) in a few minutes you have to guess which one is accurate I guess. I was hoping to get a reliable, trustworthy and accurate thermometer. This isn’t it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DogParkMom

customer_reviews.title: RIP off.  Not accurate. No return
customer_reviews.text: I was sick and old oral stick not working. Tried this 6 times in row. Read ranged from 100.1 to 102.8. Went to urgent care because worried. brought this along. They took two separate readings with botha A forehead and oral. Both read 99.9. Tried this one immediately after and got 102.1. This is sold by amazon prime. There is a place to start return. BuT it directs to Braun and no return. Areal scam. Am now stuck with $40 useless item and braun has .y $40. Way to make money Braun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It makes taking temperatures super easy and with the easily replaceable ear pieces, clean-up is a breeze. When my son was born, as worried, over-protective parents, this made getting random temperature readings very convenient and gave us piece of mind when we were in doubt. Even taking multiple readings can be done at the push of a button. It can switch between Fahrenheit and Celsius and can be easily used with one hand, very helpful when you have a baby in the other arm! For the convenience - this cannot be beat. Love it and use it frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable product. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to have an accurate reading every time. The buttons are finicky, in my opinion, if you’re not familiar with how to use one of these thermometers, but it is not difficult to use. It’s very easy to find more of the covers and they typically come in a 20 pack, which is very convenient. It comes with a bracket that prevents damage while traveling. Overall, this is a very reliable product, in my opinion. I would recommend this to a friend or colleague.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Paid extra for Braun name brand!  Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased the cheaper "no name" brands thermometers before and they just don't work as well. The cheaper brands will have much less precision and accuracy. My kid was sick and the inconsistency of the cheaper thermometer made me so mad that I quickly purchased this one. Spending a little extra is well worth getting a more consistent reading when trying to determine how sick a love one might be. I guess, in general, the ear thermometers won't be as accurate as the other types of thermometers, but this is definitely the best "ear" thermometer I've used.
customer_reviews.author: J Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Braun ear thermometer about 15-20 years ago and I finally had to replace it. With that kind of performance, I went back to Braun. Very reliable. This thermometer has improvements over the older model and is smaller, easier to use, and seems to be more accurate. I highly recommend this Braun thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Less than 3 months broke already. Purchased another one less than a year ago. Bought this brand because its reputable but their product is not built to last. Shame. Will be looking to purchase another brand
customer_reviews.author: Moo Suga

customer_reviews.title: This school nurse approves!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this thermometer for several years now at home and in practice as a school nurse. What I’ve learned over the years of taking temps is that there is no perfect thermometer. Well, maybe a hospital grade Welch Allen... Most young children do not know how to properly keep a thermometer probe in their mouths. This is especially difficult with special needs children. Infrared thermometer can be inaccurate and subject to user error. You will have to move/position the ear so you can put thermometer into ear canal. If you’re
customer_reviews.author: Kizest

customer_reviews.title: Sucks down batteries SUPER fast
customer_reviews.text: Liked this enough at first and then I started burning through batteries. We basically have to change them weekly at this point. We just put new batteries in on Saturday and it’s already down to one bar (starts with 3) and it’s only Tuesday. I love the accuracy and ease but it’s crazy to fly through batteries like this. Won’t buy again and definitely don’t recommend because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read and use, but the problem is it gives WILDLY different readings. It will go from 98 to 104 on different readings of the same person in a hour. Our daughter was fussy and felt hot, got a 103 reading and just spent $250 and several hours in the ER just to find out that she doesn't actually have a fever.
customer_reviews.author: ryan menne

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Reading not accurate. I wished I can rate this product 0. I checked my daughter’s temperature with her new Braun ear thermometer. It showed 101.2. Checked with the old one 98.7. Checked my temperature with this ear thermometer, 99.4. Then checked with my other 2 oral thermometers 97 and 97.5. I requested a return, but was told this item is not eligible for return. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: sandy l.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate measurement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on the recommendation of my friend. I never expected it to be so inaccurate. My daughter has a fever, and I take her temperature repeatedly, but the results are different every time, which makes me very annoyed, I do not know which is the right temperature for her. I'm so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot better than that Exergen thermometer. With the Exergen, you get a lot of inconsistent readings and end up taking the temperature like 4-5 times, with each time getting progressively harder with a squirming baby. The rectal thermometer is the gold standard and this probably comes in second in my opinion for accuracy and relative ease.
customer_reviews.author: Don T

customer_reviews.title: Effective & Easy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a user-friendly thermometer for my elderly mother and the Braun ThermoScan 5 Digital Ear Thermometer is the perfect product. My mother likes everything that is very easy to use and it can’t get more easy and user friendly than this. It’s very easy to use and also very sanitary with the disposal lens filters. You just slip on a filter, aim it into the ear, wait for the temperature reading, and you’re done. It really can’t get more simple than this. We’re both happy with this thermometer and recommend it for children and adults to use.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: The most accurate options! Temporal thermometers just don't work!
customer_reviews.text: We returned another one, almost twice the price and got this one. Our other one was a temporal scan, no touch all these bells and whistles and is was never consistent! At a friends reccomendation we went with this one and could not be happier. It's accurate and fast! Don't believe the hype of the "new" ones, I can't tell you how frustrating it is in the middle of the night to not be able to get an accurate temperature on your baby. These thermometers have been around forever and there's a reason most moms keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type and brand since the 1980's. I have tried the one that rolls across your head but I never get an accurate reading; meaning it usually goes to only 87.5 and I know that isn't correct. On a newborn baby, 1 to 12 month old baby, toddlers, children and adults (both young, middle age, and elderly) this unit is quick, easy, and accurate. HIGHLY recommend. I really like the fact it beeps when it gets the reading. Usually 5 seconds or less!
customer_reviews.author: Juana

customer_reviews.title: Died after just a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago, and used it maybe twice. I kept it stored in the original box exactly as I received it -- not just tossed in a drawer. I went to use it last night for my daughter and it kept giving error "POS". I changed the batteries. Nothing changed. I tried it on my wife and myself --- same error. Changed the cover, same thing. I am extremely disappointed that a brand-name thermometer like this would last less than a year, and for only a couple of uses. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: J A  E

customer_reviews.title: went through a few ear/forehead thermometer before I finally found ...
customer_reviews.text: went through a few ear/forehead thermometer before I finally found the one that "works", all the reviews were BS, my kids temp. was never correct, I had to scan their foreheads so many times and every time I scanned it, the temp was different, same with the ear. If you are going to buy something online, buy from a well known company, don't go with the no name or never heard of brand and don't trust the reviews so much, I got and threw in the trash 3 thermometers before this one
customer_reviews.author: Saffron

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry! Have this on hand for sick kids!
customer_reviews.text: I've had multiple other thermometers, most of which I purchased on Amazon. However, they were all off brand and seemed to work well for the first couple times - and then went to junk. My daughter had a fever of over 103 (was shaking, her temp was so high) and the last thermometer read 97 degrees. I knew then I needed something more reliable. A friend recommended this Braun and it's amazing! She happened to get strep throat the week after I ordered this and I used it consistently for about 3 days, never questioning the reading. Very reliable and a great product. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Willemstein

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve had but make it light up!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every single day because my son has chronic fevers and seizures. It’s accurate, quick and awesome. I only left off a star because I would like for the screen to light up for when I take his temperature at night. A red/green light up would be nice so I can tell right away if he has a fever without using my phone flashlight to view it. I don’t have a lot of time to react or mess around once he gets a fever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer for first several months. Always seemed to be very accurate and is a brand I trust. Over the last two months, however, major issue with false readings. Readings ranged from 99-107.8. Can take temp after temp and reading will go down a degree or two each time until at a normal reading. Attempted all of the common sense troubleshooting, like new batteries and still high readings. Now question any reading we get on our two year old whether in a normal range or not.... very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I bought with in two years. The last one went faulty after one year and the second one only lasted a few months. The quality is really difficult to say.... It was under free international shipping to Singapore at that time. And, the policy change now. Although the product is still under warrenty, I am not able to send it back since both Amazon and vendor would not cover the shipping fee. The shipping fee is more expensive than the proce of the product. I feel very bad about this fact. I probably would not buy this Brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Ding

customer_reviews.title: Figure out the ear!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I believe it’s accurate. It seems to be more accurate in a specific ear for both me and my wife... for me it’s my left ear, seems to get in deeper and seat better and I was constantly getting 98.6ish (Yes I was healthy no symptoms Of anything). When I used it in the other ear it didn’t seem to go as far in comfortable and didn’t seem “sealed” I was getting around 97ish on this ear Confident it’s accurate on the correct comfortable ear
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - frustrating and not accurate at all!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it always produced a higher temperature on me, even using it within seconds of several different thermometers. Super frustrating because I needed a reliable thermometer after major surgery. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: J Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Temperature with variation of 1.5 degree F
customer_reviews.text: The Thermometer is not accurate. I bought it after seeing it being used at the pediatrician and reading good reviews. However when I used it with my child, it gave me variation of 1 to 1.5 degree F in the same ear, within a span of few seconds. Since the accuracy is bad, the thermometer should get 1 star or even not that. But I am giving it two stars for its build and quality and its ability to tell you an approximation of the temperature. Be aware, when your child has more than 100 degree F temperature, you don't want an approximate temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Best Thermometer Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands Down Best Thermometer EVER! I’ve used it on my 2 year old since he was born and it always lets me know when he has a high temp. Used it on myself a few months ago after someone checked my temp with a forehead thermometer that said I was good to go. This one said I had a temp. Of 102° Which is accurate of how I felt with some kind of stomach virus. I see this got some bad reviews, maybe that’s because they got a defective one, I don’t know but I’ll never use another thermometer other than this one! Thanks Braun for making a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, but no backlight.
customer_reviews.text: I had a different tympanic thermometer that was not reliable. I asked my friend, who is a peds nurse, what she uses for her kids- and she recommended this one. It doesn't have a backlight, which sucks when you're trying to take a temperature at night, but it does seem very accurate! Readings are consistent, and varied by only .2-.3 degrees when compared to my oral (normal for this variance). Happy to have something that works well! Removed a star for the backlight.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one. Do waste time and money on another brand.
customer_reviews.text: This is the thermometer we didn’t know we needed. For use with our baby, and ourselves, this is been the most accurate ear thermometer we have owned. We tried a couple of other cheaper brands from deal of the day, but they always have inconsistent readings. This thermometer doesn’t. It gives the same reading back to back or within .1-.2 degrees of it. My wife and I love it comes with the disposable covers for the tip. That means the tip will always stay clean and sanitary. The case the thermometer comes with holds a small box of 20 tips which is nice. Overall this was worth the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: == true;

customer_reviews.title: Order the Disposable Tips Before Hand
customer_reviews.text: It works but I often get different readings on each try. I'd feel more confident in the readings if they were closer inline. Also, providing only one disposable tip was totally insufficient especially as I ordered these to make certain no family members had a temperature which might indicate exposure to covid19. I ordered them as soon as the thermometer reached my home but it took weeks to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover for Life

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, Consistent, No screen light
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer gave an accurate consistent reading every time. My wife loves it because she can check the kid's temps quickly without any fuss from them and it doesn't have to be stuck in their mouths. The only problem/dislike is that the display is hard to read in low light. The screen doesn't light up at all, so if you're checking temps at night in the dark you'll need a separate light to be able to read the screen. For the price you pay for the convenience of a speedy temp gauge, a backlight should be a basic function. All things considered, this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: B.Solo.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this thermometer. I tried another brand and it was garbage. I’ve been using this thermometer multiples times DAILY for the past two weeks while the flu made its rounds through our family and it was accurate every time. Always consistent with the temps taken at the doctor (which we’ve also visited multiple times lately). I am confident this will be a solid purchase for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the best thermometer possible but I’ve had it for over a year now and it is so inconsistent. Sometimes I take a temp in my ear and it varies wildly from one ear to the next and it’s never anywhere near what the rectal readings say. Regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: It was working well but all of a sudden it ...
customer_reviews.text: It was working well but all of a sudden it has lost calibration and is showing everyone with a very high fever. I.e. it's broken. Darn because it was expensive... Update: I contacted their customer service and they were very accommodating and they sent a replacement. Thank you!.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I needed It to work it didn’t!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked That I recieved it in a timely manner. My husband and I tested it when we got it and it worked. The first time I actually Needed it to work (6 weeks later) it didn’t. Says battery low. I know I did not leave it in the “on” position. Too late to return to Amazon. Really bummed because I paid Extra for what I thought Was the best choice in ear thermometers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fenwick

customer_reviews.title: Quality Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Previously I had a safety first thermometer (the one that comes in the first aid kit) and I wasn’t sure if it was working well or not. When the batteries died I decided to splurge and get a new one. My cousin who is a Nurse Practioner recommended this one. It gives instant and accurate readings and just feels like a quality thermometer. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arod4Real

customer_reviews.title: it makes the entire temperature taking exercise a tedious one.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this to the newer version because it is fuss-free. This is how a thermometer should function. Turn it on, shows you the last reading made (in case you need it), then allows you to take a new reading after a short wait. The newer version requires you to input the information about the person. While it is supposed to give you more "intelligent" reading and information, it makes the entire temperature taking exercise a tedious one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and super convenient thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand mom before she headed back to Korea. I loved how super convenient ear thermometer was for her especially during the COVID pandemic to keep in track of her temperature. I loved how quick and easy to use for her, knowing that she doesn't speak English. Nevertheless, it's an awesome tool for anyone to use in order to accurately measure the body temperature!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your household
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer. It is so easy to get a quick and accurate temperature reading whether you are getting your own reading doing it for a child. It is so easy in fact my daughter has been able to check her temperature when she wasn’t feeling well since she was 3 years old. I would definitely recommend this thermometer for all households.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and pretty accurate
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace the older model that I have from 20 years ago. It finally gave out malfunctioning. I believe the Braun thermometer is quite reliable and last a long time. Remember to check the battery every so many months so to confirm that the thermometer is working normally otherwise old battery may damage the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: User friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it was so easy to remove from the packaging! And that I didn’t have to struggle with batteries, etc. it’s like they knew I was sick. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S.

customer_reviews.title: which are horribly inaccurate. Was recommended the Braun ear thermometer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for a digital thermometer for a while after using the forehead ones, which are horribly inaccurate. Was recommended the Braun ear thermometer and after using it multiple times on our LOs, the readings I feel have been fairly accurate (whereas the forehead thermometers were very very off). Took off a star as the only way these will work is with the ear thermometer covers, which needs to be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One measurement in fifty attempts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July after my little one was ill. I tried it out of the box and it worked. Now my little one is sick again and every attempt ends in a “POS” read. I have attempted it with my spouse, my child, a grandparent, and all result in “POS”. I have changed covers repeatedly with no change in outcome. If I am lucky, I get a read every 20-30 attempts but sometimes I give up before even a single measurement. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: emr

customer_reviews.title: Not working, gives error
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give this a 5 star review since this is what i’m used to using and this is what my colleagues usually suggest for me to buy. Just last this thursday. It started to give me erro message. I tried removing the battery placing it back, then changing the ear lens filter, but nothing seems to work. I hope i get someone to help me with this.
customer_reviews.author: Spongy

customer_reviews.title: Not Complicated as Some Others
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and the first thing I did was test it out to see how difficult it would be to use, I got to give this device a AA+, it had the instruction manual all set for one to see when you removed it from the box, there was an instruction video on Amazon that also made it easy to use right away, I would recommend this Thermometer to anyone who does not need to struggle with operation and use
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Tapetillo

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this thermometer at first. After a few months, it started giving readings that were all over the place. I tried it on myself and my family members before getting our temperature taken at 2 different doctor's offices. Temperatures were off by 2-3 degrees (such as showing a fever when we were clearly healthy).
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Weird temps
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I purchased it, but I realize as time as gone by, it does not work, hasn't in over a year. It keeps giving me reads of 93.4 or 94.5. Weird numbers. I have changed batteries numerous times. I guess when I need it most I go to use it and does not work a nd I end up using the Walgreens $7.99 one. So, for the money I think it should last longer than a couple of years, and hasn't even worked in the past couple of years. Debating if I should try again or not.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Worthless piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is GARBAGE. The temp is wildly different from second to second. Your temp might start at 98.0 and literally moments later it reads 101 then it’s down to 97 and so on. This is not a defective thermometer as per other reviews with the same issue. It does not work correctly EVER, not on its best day.
customer_reviews.author: Macaria81

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars I would. The readings are way off, and very hard to read, can’t tell what the numbers even are usually, the 0 looks like an 8 or 9, it’s just terrible. My little one has been sick but it says her temperature is 108! For the amount of money I paid for this I’m highly disappointed that it is worthless and I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and it's not working.. the screen is blinking all the time. When I asked to return, I was ghosted and told to contact the manufacturer. Don't recommend this seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: VicK

customer_reviews.title: Display does not light up! Very hard to read unless full light is on
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ear thermometer a couple months ago and haven’t had to use until the last couple nights. Well, I can tell you it was VERY frustrating to read the results when the room only has a nightlight and you are trying to check your child’s temperature. I cannot believe that for $40 the display does not light up! It is now outside the return window and we are stuck with it. 😠
customer_reviews.author: IAS

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand forehead ones this has been the easiest to use and most accurate. The reading stays the same when j double check and doesn't jump all over the place. It's my absolute favorite! My mom is a nurse and favors this one and I just had to get one too instead of borrowing hers.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Horribly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, my kids complain that it hurts and I’m poking them. The worst is that it’s way off on the temperature reading. It’s always a few degrees worm or cold, so after I take 3 or 4 readings I get a general idea if they are hot or cold. I am honestly quite ticked that I spent so much on a peace of junk and now need to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: WARNING about the POS error
customer_reviews.text: So, I’ve owned this for just a little over a year and it has been a godsend in ways that made late nights bearable in taking temps with a crabby, sick toddler - which is main reason I’m giving it 3 stars and not 1. Now let’s get to the bad part, the POS ERROR. It’s a position error and no matter what you do - reset, change batteries, etc - it will not work. I’ve been all the troubleshooting steps. It’s basically garbage after that point.
customer_reviews.author: Steph F

customer_reviews.title: AVOID - product does not work properly and no returns
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived in a padded envelope and was pushed open like something heavy had been set on top of it (the envelope itself was not damaged). The thermometer turned on initially. It then proceeded to take 3 very different temperature readings (same ear, within minutes of each other) before it stopped working all together. Unfortunately it is nonreturnable because it is medical equipment, so it was a flat out waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this a long time ago! I never wanted to spend the money on the thermometer but after growing tired of fighting my second child every time I wanted to take a temperature I broke down and bought this. It is super fast and she is so much more agreeable to using it. User friendly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great value
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is compact and easy to use. The thermometer fits nicely in your hand and is not awkward to use. The temperature reading was very close to that of our glass thermometer. It comes with a case and plenty of replacement covers. I would recommend this product over the more expensive model. I was more than impressed with the product and it exceeded my initial expectations.
customer_reviews.author: ANLOC

customer_reviews.title: quit working after one flu season
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes after spending $40 on this thermometer. After a few months the little screen blinks and the thermometer has stopped functioning. I have searched for a way to return or replace this item and have not had any luck. May have used the device 10 or 12 times. If anyone sees this and can help me, please advise. I like the idea of the product, but maybe I just got a bad one?
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Temperature not accurate - runs low
customer_reviews.text: I owned this product in the past and it was relatively accurate, but after a couple of years it didn't work as well and would give me low readings of 97. I ordered this new one and tested it on me and my two children and all of us had temperatures around 97, which obviously was not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is quick and easy to use and especially on the little ones. I have found it to be very accurate and would recommend it as an item for all households. I received one as a gift many years ago and recently purchased several to give to other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Cai

customer_reviews.title: Most accurate and reliable thermometer I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and I see patients in their homes. It's important to me to carry reliable equipment. I've tried at least 10 different kinds of thermometers and this one is the best and easiest to use by far. Also very reliable. No questionable readings. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality especially- compared to old Braun
customer_reviews.text: Due to Corona virus- I’m not able to reach anyone- anywhere- creditors. Etc. I’ve had a Braun for years. It always worked Change batteries. First use i had to buy batteries. The product is inferior on the interior. 3 different sets of two batteries. Doesn’t work. Pissed
customer_reviews.author: Learner 4 Life❗️

customer_reviews.title: No screen light!
customer_reviews.text: Braun is always relieble brand for me, i get this tonight but i am not so happy bcs has no screen light. I will return and will get new with light. Otherwise is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Helen McManus

customer_reviews.title: Consistent readings
customer_reviews.text: Finally one that works. We've bought so many different brands and types of these high tech thermometers and all of them are garbage and have been immediately returned. This Braun works great. We've used it heavily for a period of several weeks when everyone in the house got a bad fever and it measured accurately and consistently every time. Very happy with this product. UPDATE: About 4 months after we bought this, it started giving wildly inaccurate readings every time. Contacted Braun and they gave us no hassles about doing an RMA exchange. Got the new one quickly if I recall and it's been working great for nearly two more years now. Still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I love that it takes regular batteries!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is great. It works well and is accurate. I have compared it to another and they match. I love that it takes regular batteries and I don't have to go to the store to get those little silver disc batteries that I can never remember the size of!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty quick to take a sample
customer_reviews.text: I take 2 or 3 samples in each ear just to make sure everything accurate. It is pretty quick to take a sample, which is good because trying to take a squirmy 1 year-old's temp isn't easy... Battery lasts a long time and operation is pretty darn simple, though my Father did seem to have trouble operating it...
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: We got this thermometer because out pediatric office has one very similar. The kids do so much better now at the doctor because we have one at home. I feel like it is accurate and it is easy to use. I love the recall setting that tells you what the past few temperatures where. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how quick this thermometer reads. This RN and mom is loving it. I had another Braun tympanic that I had for more than 8 years and finally died. **Please keep in mind that tympanic (ear) thermometers often read 0.5-1 degree F higher than an oral reading.** Braun has done great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, and useful
customer_reviews.text: Used it for weeks to compare with our old one. This one does faster to measure temperature; however, it still need to have right position for accuracy result. Since we used the same family products for many years, it wasn't an issue for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jiunjr Feng

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers that the readings can vary a little. For me it's only a degree or two and i just do 2 - 3 readings and feel it's accurate enough. It's much faster than the armpit i was using and I am not interested in using a rectal on my son - even though it is supposed to be the most accurate. I am pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, but reads a different tempurature each time
customer_reviews.text: If you take your tempurature once, then immediately after, it'll be two different readings. Within a couple degrees, but still, that could mean emergency room or not above if it's above 100. Basically it's just convenient and you can tell if you're running a fever or not. Not very accurate otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: CDandEB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t read accurate temperature
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. It’s never accurate. Always says my son has a high temp as well as me. I really needed a accurate one since I have a NICU baby. Don’t waste your money buying this
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wiley

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still works fine
customer_reviews.text: Three years and many illnesses later, and this thermometer is still working fine. The only drawback: you can't read it in the dark. When we take the temperature of our boy while he's sleeping, we can't read the readout without a lamp on. Otherwise we are perfectly happy with this since 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel K Woodward

product_meta.title: Braun Digital Ear Thermometer, ThermoScan 5 IRT6500, Ear Thermometer for Babies, Kids, Toddlers and Adults, Display is Digital and Accurate, Thermometer for Precise Fever Tracking at Home
product_meta.description: Braun Thermoscan5 ear thermometer. No.1 brand among pediatricians and mom. Proven more accurate than rectal or temple thermometers.
feature_bullets: BRAUN EAR THERMOMETER: Braun ThermoScan5 is fast, gentle, easy & accurate, making it great for checking for fevers in infants & kids, & the reason Braun ear thermometers are used in more pediatrician's offices than other children's thermometers.

DIGITAL EAR THERMOMETER: Braun's innovative pre-warmed tip on the ThermoScan 5 ensures accurate temperature readings for infants and kids, unlike other ear thermometers where the cool tip of the thermometer in the ear may result in lower temperatures.

DIGITAL THERMOMETERS FOR KIDS & ADULTS: With innovative designs & easy to use controls, Braun child thermometers are great for adults, too. Disposable lens filters for ear thermometers & easy to clean digital & forehead thermometers keep sharing sanitary.

RELIABLE & ACCURATE THERMOMETERS: Braun knows that the most accurate thermometer readings are important to parents, & we designed our digital thermometers, no touch + forehead thermometers, & ear thermometers to be accurate, reliable & easy to use.
THE MOST USED THERMOMETERS BY PEDIATRICIANS: Your family's health is important to you & Braun makes digital thermometers you can rely on.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
